subject: ATTN: BENEFICIARY,GOOD DAY G
body:
ATTN: BENEFICIARY,GOOD DAY GET BACK TO ME
(IMF) International Monetary Fund, in alliance with the economic
community of West African States (ECOWAS). We have been working
towards the eradication of fraudsters and scam Artists in the world,
especially the Western part of Africa, with help of the United States
Government and the United Nations we have been able to track down some
scam artists,
We have been able to recover a huge amount of money from these scams.
artists, The IMF Managing Director have agreed with the United Nations
Anti-crime commission and the United The government states that all
the money recovered from the scammers will be shared among 100 lucky
people around the globe and they are all in Government custody now,
you have been compensated with  a sum of $4.5million US Dollars, You
have to reconfirm your information below for the conclusion of your
payment.
Please get back to me
Full Name:___________
Country:_____________
Phone Number:_______
Age:________________
sex:________________
Best Regard,
REV MATHEW JAMES
International Monetary Fund
Chief Information Officer,

subject: Re:   ATTN: BENEFICIARY,GOOD DAY G
body:
Hello REV MATHEW JAMES,

Wow, that's some really interesting information you've shared there! I'm quite surprised to hear about all this. It's great to know that organizations like the IMF and ECOWAS are working hard to combat fraudsters and scam artists.

I'm curious though, how was I chosen for this? And could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Irma

subject: Re: ATTN: BENEFICIARY,GOOD DAY G
body:
ATTN:  Irma







We are in receipt of your mail, the content is well noted. Please send the
complete information below to enable me to finalize your payment
documentation before forwarding your payment file to the paying bank and
instruct them to contact you for your fund payment.  This is strictly by
luck, and the lot fell on you.



We use this opportunity to thank you for your anticipated cooperation;
looking forward to hearing from you soonest



Full Name:___________

Country:_____________

Phone Number:_______

Age:________________

Yours Faithfully,



REV. MATHEW JAMES

International Monetary Fund

Chief Information Officer

subject: Re: ATTN: BENEFICIARY,GOOD DAY G
body:
Hello REV. MATHEW JAMES,

Thank you for your email and the opportunity that has fallen on me. I'm quite excited about this! Could you please provide more details about the payment process? How does it work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Irma
